page.title: 03Childrens Activities
page.content: The village of Blackford does not have many clubs for children, in fact the only club is for girls and that is the Brownies. In the Brownies there are 11 girls and four helpers. Brown Owl Mrs Laird District Commissioner Mrs Graham Guider Miss Graham Young Leader Miss Nugent For other activities children have to travel to Longtown or Carlisle. some boys go to Cubs and Judo. Some children have their own computers which they use for recreation. There is also a Riding School in the area where children can learn to ride, many children from outside this area travel here in order to learn to ride.
